name: mndlid
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1))

comment: The identity element of a monoid is a left identity. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2011.)
